description: Mixing ingredients is cool, but what if you need /6/a bit more heat?/6/
A /b/Charcoal Burner/b/ will give you /6/low-level heat/6/, good enough to make a few recipes.
To use, fuel the burner by /b/right clicking/b/ it with /6/charcoal/6/. Once fueled, /6/activate it with a flint and steel./6/ Once started, it will /6/burn until it runs out of fuel./6/

> --/7/The heat this gives off is fairly poor, but it allows for some basic cooking of mixed ingredients. I've got to find a better solution if I want to be able to melt anything metal. For now, it can speed up Andesite Alloy production./7/--
